name: Oklahoma
notes:
[Executive Order Reports](https://coronavirus.health.ok.gov/executive-order-reports)
first reported [comprehensive test results](https://coronavirus.health.ok.gov/articles/new-data-private-labs-show-tenfold-increase-covid-19-tests-administered-oklahoma-dating) on 4/6. We exclude "Positive (Out-of-State)" results, as we assume these are isolated outside the state.
As of April 27, Oklahoma is reporting specimens tested. Because some people may be tested more than once, this number is probably higher than the number of people tested.
